alert.note: Alert for Goliad (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 2:36PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Goliad and northeastern Bee Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 235 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Charco, or 11 miles west of Goliad, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Normanna, Pettus, Berclair, Tuleta and Charco. This includes the following highways... US Highway 181 between mile markers 576 and 582. US Highway 59 between mile markers 672 and 688. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
